isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000i and 9000i - CAB ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - DEFROSTER FANS

svcproc.title: DEFROSTER FANS
svcproc.para: Power for the defroster fan(s) is supplied from fuse F5-B on circuits 86E and 78F to connector (313). When the defroster switch is in the high position, power from connector (313) flows through the switch to the high speed windings of the defroster motor(s). When the defroster switch is in the low position, power from connector (313) flows through the switch to the low speed windings of the defroster motor(s). Ground for the motors is provided on circuits 11-GB, 11-GAB, 11-GAC and 76-G.
